title: Burrito Bar: Food Ordering App
excerpt: Quickly analyzing the digital business landscape, we create effective action plans and design optimal strategies.
body: Food Ordering App for a restaurant located in San Francisco, California, United States. It let's you connect to the local server, see all the menu, select the food you want, with extras and option to remove ingredients. Users can pay through the online payment system integerated, i.e PayPal, Square, Stripe etc.

subContent.title: Digital Marketing.
subContent.text: Marketing has always been about connecting with your audience in the right place and at the right time. Today, that means you need to meet them where they are already spending time: on the internet. A seasoned inbound marketer might say inbound marketing and digital marketing are virtually the same thing, but there are some minor differences. And conversations with marketers and business owners in the U.S., U.K., Asia, Australia, and New Zealand, I've learned a lot about how those small differences are being observed across the world.

title: IamMusic: Music Teaching App
excerpt: Quickly analyzing the digital business landscape, we create effective action plans and design optimal strategies.
body: Online Music Learning Portal. Teachers and Students can sign up and teach/learn via video conferencing. Teachers can list their courses and students can select their preferred course to start.

title: Cafe Gitana: Restraunt Website
excerpt: Quickly analyzing the digital business landscape, we create effective action plans and design optimal strategies.
body: Restaurant Website for Cafe Gitana located in Montreal, QC, Canada. Website features a very modern and attractive design with all the menu displayed. Users can also order through the website and checkout using online payment methods..

title: Nursify: Academic Paper Writing Service
excerpt: Quickly analyzing the digital business landscape, we create effective action plans and design optimal strategies.
body: Nursify is a reputable online writing service provider Globally.We have always prioritized the aspect of working towards customer satisfaction and this is by giving them the good grades they are looking for. Nursing Class Essays has a team of tried and tested writers who have specialized in the different services that we offer. We at Nursing Class Essays have provided a conducive environment for our writers so that they can maximize their productivity and deliver that assignment no matter its deadline.

title: TrustBar: Crypto Wallet
excerpt: Quickly analyzing the digital business landscape, we create effective action plans and design optimal strategies.
body: TrustBar is a digital wallet for Crypto currencies which provides user to store, pay and recieve cryptocurrencies with a simple scan of a barcode or input of wallet address.
